citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Office of Oceanic and Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)
citeinfo.title: Gulf of Alaska CTDs (1974-1977)

abstract.p: CTD data were collected using Plessy CTD's, during the years 1974 to 1977. Data are averaged to one meter records. These data are stored on 6,793 disk files (41.6MB), and most of these were collected as part of the FOX and FOCI projects.

descript.purpose: A report on the Gulf of Alaska CTDs (1974-1977).

idinfo.accconst: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.
idinfo.useconst: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.
